job.title: Observability Platform Engineer - Elasticsearch RWF
job.description: Job DescriptionImportant Note: During the application process, ensure your contact information (email and phone number) is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration. To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation. The invitation can be sent by both email and text message. In order to receive text message invitations, your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as âPersonal Cellâ or âCellularâ in the contact information of your application.At Wells Fargo, we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do. We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity, equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspired.Help us build a better Wells Fargo. It all begins with outstanding talent. It all begins with you.Technology sets IT strategy; enhances the design, development, and operations of our systems; optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure; provides information security; and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day, 7 days a week banking access through in-branch, online, ATMs, and other channels.Our mission is to deliver stable, secure, scalable, and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employees.The Chief Technology Office Enterprise Observability Team is responsible for delivering innovative, scalable, stable, and secure products that provide deep business insight, operational insight, and predictive analysis.As a member of the team, you will be a key contributor to the development of products that provide full stack observability including application monitoring, logging, alerting, and visualization.The Observability Software Engineer will design, develop, and implement near real-time data streams, ingesting and enriching business and operational data from various sources across the organization as part of a new enterprise observability platform.The Ideal Applicant Will HaveDemonstrated experience with the ElasticSearch, Logstash and Kibana stack.Installation and configuration of ClustersIndexing DataQueries, Aggregations, MappingsCluster Administration and AutomationAct as the subject matter expert for ELK implementation across the shared service platform.Collaborate with other observability engineers when working on cross team efforts.Ability to integrate with other operational data platforms and tools including Kafka, Splunk, etc.Experience with other observability products such as AppDynamics, ITRS Geneos, Datadog, NewRelic, Prometheus, Grafana, Wavefront, etc.Proven track-record of partnering with internal customers, architects, engineers and other technical partners to gather requirements, understand existing systems and develop value-added products/services.Experience in deploying and operating time series metrics Database Prometheus, Cortex etc.,Experience in supporting distributed tracing architectureRWF - Please note that "RWF" is an identifier for internal recruiting purposes only and has no connection to the nature or responsibilities of the job.Required Qualifications5 + years of experience with Elasticsearch development, integration or support2+ years of automation experience5+ years of software engineering experienceDesired QualificationsA BS/BA degree or higherAgile experienceAbility to develop partnerships and collaborate with other business and functional areasGood verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skillsStrong analytical skills with high attention to detail and accuracy2 + years of experience with Elasticsearch development, integration or supportKnowledge and understanding of Cloud computing, PaaS design principles and micro services and containersScripting and automation experienceExperience with data streaming technologies and use casesExperience with RESTful API callsStrong verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skillsAn industry-standard technology certificationOther Desired Qualifications3+ years of experience building solutions involving logging, metrics, and traces to meet or exceed business requirementsExperience with site reliability engineering practices for monitoring, reporting, and visualization of service level objectives and key performance indicators.Understanding of application tracing technologies and can work directly with development and platform support teams to enable these technologies, e.g. Open Telemetry, Jaeger.2+ years working with configuration and monitoring experience with GrafanaAdvanced experience with Kibana to include developing and manipulating Kibana for visualizations and analysisUnderstanding of software design as it relates to ElasticSearch deployments or distributed computing / system architectureExperience designing real time and batch log analytics and search solutions using ELK stack.Design and implement multi-tenancy in ElasticSearch for data isolation and visualization in Kibana by different tenants of the shared serviceExperience designing, implementing, deploying and managing large ElasticSearch clusters and ELK solutionsExperience working with cross-functional teams to plan, model and implement solutions utilizing Kafka and ELK technologiesJob ExpectationsAbility to work on call as assignedFlexibility to address incidents as needed 24 hours a dayAbility to work additional hours as neededAbility to travel up to 10% of the timeDisclaimerAll offers for employment with Wells Fargo are contingent upon the candidate having successfully completed a criminal background check. Wells Fargo will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable local, state and Federal law, including Section 19 of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act.Relevant military experience is considered for veterans and transitioning service men and women.Wells Fargo is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer, Minority/Female/Disabled/Veteran/Gender Identity/Sexual Orientation.BenefitsBenefits SummaryVisit https://www.wellsfargo.com/about/careers/benefits for benefits information.Reference Number5595862-2
